doc.title: How I Lost My Virginity by Alexandra Jones
doc.plot: Alexandra was the most sheltered girl on campus when she arrived at Southern California University... and now she's making up for lost time! A rogue sorority, secret societies, and the evil Dean Stockwell will all get schooled by the irrepressible Alexandra Jones in this unique, millennial twist on the college sex comedy that mixes firecracker charm with laugh-out-loud humor and a sly, subversive wit.
